item.description:
For the past few month's The Boston Happy Hour Meetup has enjoyed the wonderful warm hospitality of Sweet Caroline's as we played Geeks who Drink trivia on Tuesdays.

They've been so busy at doing such a fantastic job of taking care of business that they haven't been able to have a proper Grand Opening...until now.

They've invited us (including Red Sox Natives) to help them celebrate this Saturday February 25th from 9 PM until 2 AM. I know it will be a GRAND time based on their AMAZING Valentines's Day party and the trivia fun with Geeks Who Drink on Fat Tuesday.

This is a RED CARPET AFFAIR at which Chef David Castro will provide scrumptious appetizers which will be complimentary. If you come hungry and want more here's Sweet Caroline's Menu.

You will also be able to buy great cocktails and select from their numerous beer on draft and in bottles as well their extensive wine list.

Here's your chance to check out the SWEETEST spot in the Fenway which has plenty of room....matter of fact 4,000 square feet of it. Sweet C's has its own living Green Monster.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Fifteen minute walk from Kenmore station (green line) or Hynes Convention Center station (green line) or from #1 Bus get off at Mass Avenue bus stop at intersection of Boylston Street follow the signs to Fenway Park.

There has been plenty of nearby metered street parking on Tuesdays however this is a Saturday night so consider using Best Parking to find nearby parking spots.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.name: Walk the Red Carpet Tonight
